languages.text: On a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: При критическом {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} этот меч накладывает +1 уровень эффекта "рваная рана". Удары этого меча по той же цели наносят +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждый уровень эффекта.

traits.locale_text: On a critical hit, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% damage.

При критическом попадании этот меч накладывает +1 уровень эффекта "рваная рана". Удары этого меча по той же цели наносят +10% урона за каждый уровень эффекта.

languages.text: 暴击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，对目标施加1层“撕裂”效果。目标每有1层“撕裂”效果，这把武器所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%。
languages.original_text: On a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 暴击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，对目标施加1层“撕裂”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。目标每有1层“撕裂”效果，这把武器所有攻击造成的伤害提高10%。

languages.text: この剣がリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}すると、裂創効果1スタックを付与する。裂創のスタックごとに、同じターゲットへのこの剣による攻撃すべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+10%増加する。
languages.original_text: On a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}すると、裂創{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}1スタックを付与。裂創のスタックごとに、同じターゲットへのこの剣による攻撃すべてのダメージ+10%

languages.text: Al realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico con esta espada, se añade +1 acumulación del efecto laceración. Por cada acumulación de laceración, todos los ataques con esta arma dirigidos al mismo objetivo causan +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico con esta espada, se añade +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} laceración. Por cada acumulación de laceración, todos los ataques con esta arma dirigidos al mismo objetivo causan +10 % de daño.

languages.text: Bei einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} fügt dieses Schwert +1 Stapel "Schnittwunde" zu. Für jeden Stapel von "Schnittwunde" verursachen alle Angriffe dieses Schwerts gegen dasselbe Ziel +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bei einem {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritischen Treffer{/g} addiert dieses Schwert +1 des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} Schnittwunde hinzu. Für jede Addition von Schnittwunde fügen alle Angriffe dieses Schwerts gegen dasselbe Ziel +10 % Schaden zu.

languages.text: Lorsqu'un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique est porté, cette épée inflige +1 cumul de l'effet Déchiquetage. Pour chaque cumul de Déchiquetage, toutes les attaques exécutées contre la même cible avec cette épée infligent +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: On a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique est porté, cette épée inflige +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Lacération. Pour chaque cumul de Lacération, toutes les attaques menées contre la même cible à l'aide de cette épée infligent +10 % de dégâts.
